amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a program acknowledging contributions of third parties to a State DOT's roadside maintenance through a corporate logo made of live plant materials rather than conventional metallic material.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to establish a program to permit the use of live plant materials for road side maintenance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 255 (Roll no. 600).

action.text: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Hunter to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
